Award.AwardTitle: EAGER: Towards the Model Checking of the Partitioned Global Address Space (PGAS) Applications

Directorate.LongName: Direct For Computer & Info Scie & Enginr

Division.LongName: Division of Computing and Communication Foundations

Award.AbstractNarration: The requested amount of the revised budget is equal to $95,725.00 and the difference with the original budget will be covered by the cost share of $10,206.00 that Michigan Tech will provide. The total budget includes two months of summer salary for Dr. Ebnenasir and 18 months of graduate student support spanned over 12 months. One graduate student who has been involved in the preliminary investigations of this project during past 4 months will be supported by this project for the entire 12 months. Another PhD student -- who will participate in Task 3 -- will be supported for the final 6 months of the project.
